text: 26.18: Mt 21.3Kamavahu Jisas nurɨŋ kru mumɨŋgarɨm ambata ambami, Pɨhu aru nɨñɨ indɨhuta kru kandɨhamaŋ ŋgata ambamara, Ahusɨki hama ambi, Yandɨ hɨvɨ ha arɨñɨ payɨ. Harɨm, yi naŋga yandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga pata nandɨ tavɨyɨ Got Israel Hatiŋ Mitahi Aviŋgɨyɨmu Hɨvɨ haŋandɨhinɨrɨm indarɨramata ñɨmɨndaŋ, vamba ambi, vamba ambamara, vami.
